moves.1. e4 e5 2. d4 exd4 3. c3: I go into my favorite danish gambit.
moves.5. Nxc3: I have my lead in development.
moves.7... O-O 8. a3: I force him to make an unpleasant decision.
moves.8... Ba5: Correct. Taking on c3 leads to trouble.
moves.9. b4 Bb6 10. O-O: I avoid the check after Bg5 Qxc3+.
moves.12... Qg6 13. b5: I give the knight a boot.
moves.16... Qxc1+: ?? The queen needed to stay with the king.
moves.17... Qxc3: ?? But then he was lost. Qe3+ would hold on longer.
moves.19. Nh6+ Kh8: I could play a straight Rxf8# but I finish in grand style.
